title: The zkEVM is Here | zkSync's Steve Newcomb
description:
By the end of October, zkSync is going to be shipping the world's first zkEVM. We brought on zkSync's Chief Product Officer, Steve Newcomb to share all about it and how it's going to impact the space.

We also had to ask Steve, wen token? Tune into the episode to hear his response!

------
Swell | Liquid Staking for the People
https://bankless.cc/swelldiscord

️ ZKSYNC | THE LAYER 2 SCALING ENDGAME
https://bankless.cc/zkSync
